title: Are Rage Against the Machine Native Americans? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Only in the sense that they were born in America. Zack de la Roche is of Mexican ancestry the rest are your garden variety white boys. However they are in my top 5 best bands ever, and Battle for Los Angeles is my desert island album it has got to be one of the greatest albums of all times, I love (Not like) every single song on it. Thanks for the question.
No. None of them are Native American. Their various ethnicities include Irish, German, Italian, Polish, Kenyan, Jewish, and Mexican ancestry. No Native American at all.
